stories.text:
it looks like this

https://twitter.com/jessrai3/status/1459694103118192644

https://i.postimg.cc/L8cG9bG5/Screenshot-from-2021-11-14-01-51-34.png

There are hundreds of these being posted every hour all over Elon Musk and space-x accounts :

https://twitter.com/elonmusk/status/1459563497403170824

earnings from one wallet, many more wallets

https://www.blockchain.com/btc/address/1MuskPA973mjbS5z5UdhuiEBSePFPTwWWS

new one:

https://www.blockchain.com/btc/address/1MuskhTeHydj3PzdUEgeaoQcS3xbAReFRa

I don't understand what is so hard about twitter blocking "CRYPGIVE dot NET" . It's obvious that this is out of control. Users are reporting this.

Thousands of twitter accounts are being hacked daily to spam and defraud people out of thousands of dollars/day in crypto. Unlimited number of hacked accounts. There is probably some exploit that allows this. I remember a long time ago trying to contact twitter about how hackers could steal accounts through something like a cloud cluster to change ips.

When thousands of accounts are being hacked daily to post the same message to the the same accounts (elon and space x) for months on end, I don't see how twitter cannot not be aware of this problem.

Like july 2020 hack but everyday and thousands of accounts/day

How much money do ppl have to lose before something is done. $200 million? That is like a years worth of ransomware. I think one person made $20 million in 3 months from elon twitter spam and a few others made millions. Easily tens of millions of dollars a year in revenues.
stories.title: Twitter Elon Musk spam, thousands Twitter accounts hacked daily
